entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
